resources.string: "This file is opened in read only mode. \nTo modify this document, you must first use the 'Save As' menu option."
"There was not enough memory to open your document."
"Your document is in an unknown format and cannot be openned."
"Your document could not be read from its source."
"Your document could not be read for an unknwon reason."
"The selected destination is null, your document can't be saved. \n Try saving your document in another location."
"A document is already being saved, try again later."
"The node content (%1$s) has been cut and put into your clipboard."
"The node content (%1$s) has been copied to your clipboard."
